devdoc.details: All function calls are currently implemented without side effects

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setStartTime(uint256).details: This should be called before vesting starts

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateRecipient(address,uint256).details: This is called by presale contract

vested(address).details: Calculates available amount depending on vesting params

withdraw().details: Anyone can claim their tokens Warning: Take care of re-entrancy attack here. Vesting tokens are from not our own, which means re-entrancy can happen when the transfer happens. For now, we do checks-effects-interactions, but for absolute safety, we may use reentracny guard.

returns._0: Remaining vested amount of vesting token

devdoc.title: Paycer Vesting Contract

OwnerUpdated(address).notice: An event emitted when owner is updated

StartTimeSet(uint256).notice: An event emitted when startTime is set

VestingInfoUpdated(address,uint256).notice: An event emitted when the vesting schedule is updated.

Withdraw(address,uint256).notice: An event emitted when withdraw happens

ACCURACY().notice: General decimal values ACCURACY unless specified differently (e.g. fees, exchange rates)

amountToBeVested().notice: Total balance of this vesting contract

lockPeriod().notice: Period before release vesting starts, also it unlocks initialUnlock vesting tokens. (in time unit of block.timestamp)

recipients(address).notice: Vesting schedule info for each user(presale)

releaseInterval().notice: Intervals that the release happens. Every interval, releaseRate of tokens are released.

releaseRate().notice: Release percent in each withdrawing interval

totalVestingAmount().notice: Sum of all user's vesting amount

vested(address).notice: Returns the amount of vested vesting tokens

vestingPeriod().notice: Period to release all vesting token, after lockPeriod + vestingPeriod it releases 100% of vesting tokens. (in time unit of block.timestamp)

withdraw().notice: Withdraw tokens when vesting is ended

userdoc.notice: You can use this contract for token vesting
